channel.title: Eclipse639 client host problems
channel.description:
well couple days ago i portforwarded and opened port 43594. so then i download no-ip make a host. domain was (Name).no-ip.biz so then i check it off open utorrent to open port 43594 again. then i go to the client folder i edit ~run eclipse 639 the file you click to play the client, and i edit that file and at the bottom line it asks for ur host name. i enter my host name in there clicked save and opened ~run eclipse 639 then the client window opens up and it stays at 1% and whenever you open the client a cmd pops up and says error_j5connect
can anyone help me plz!!?!?

item.title: Eclipse639 client host problems
item.dc:creator: @Vexi Vexi
item.description:
@Vexi wrote:

Only Thing i can think of is

  1. Your JDK isn’t right Client > Run > Edit to your new version.

  2. You don’t have the cache on your C: Drive

Read full topic

item.description:
